name: Nuclear Reign
description:
Your home was attacked and you were left for dead.  Technically, they did kill you, but you live... again.

Nuclear Reign is a turn-based RPG made for the RPG Mania III game jam.  It is set in a post-apocalyptic world.  You can visit any of the dungeons at any time and doing the handful of quests that currently exist is optional.  Each time you visit a dungeon level for the first time it is randomly generated with pre-made sections.  Once a level has been visited it becomes persistent.  The layout, loot and enemies will remain for the rest of that playthrough.  You can and should leave and revisit dungeons as needed.

The dungeons do not scale to player level, instead they always have the same lists associated with them, so while it is random it will always have a specific set of possible things to find and fight.
